did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Includes correspondence, course material, and publications concerning Lyson's work.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Professor of Development Sociology, Cornell University from 1987-2007.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Includes correspondence, course material, photographs, and publications concerning Lyson's work on community, civic engagement and problem-solving approaches to development, as well as local and global aspects of agriculture, food, nutrition, and health. Papers and examinations from his years as a doctoral student at Michigan State and files and a manuscript relating to academic job searches in the late 1970s.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York State College of Agriculture and Life Sciences.Dept. of Development Sociology.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Thomas Lyson Papers, #21/33/3600. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
